item.title: Small Gouache People
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Doing little studies like this can really take the pressure off from the bigger or more important pieces. These are about 5 inch tall and I try..‘try’ to not spend too long on each. I’d recommend working small and moving on quickly if you’re trying to build a daily habit.
